/usr/bin/c++ CMakeFiles/brad_example.dir/main.cc.o CMakeFiles/brad_example.dir/brad_server.cc.o CMakeFiles/brad_example.dir/brad_sql_info.cc.o CMakeFiles/brad_example.dir/brad_statement.cc.o CMakeFiles/brad_example.dir/brad_statement_batch_reader.cc.o CMakeFiles/brad_example.dir/brad_tables_schema_batch_reader.cc.o -o brad_example  /usr/lib/libarrow_flight_sql.so.1500.0.0 /usr/lib/libgflags.so.2.2.2 /usr/lib/libarrow_flight.so.1500.0.0 /usr/lib/libarrow.so.1500.0.0 -lpthread
